Ideas

This is what I don't do.

Sea Serpent / Snake Thingie

My friend Mike showed me a snakeboard (aka waveboard). Super fun. I found about Freelines which looked even crazier, and expensive-er. Actually tried to build some (they were horrible) and then threw down the $100 for them. Guessing the company is gone now - their site is gone. Fun, really hard to learn, but ultimately just not efficient at all to get anywhere.

ANYWAY… I was wondering if something similar could be done in water and sketched up the idea with some tags from my friends. Check it out! Think it could work?

Someone do this for Redbull's Flugtag event!
